fallback_responses.fallback_response_1: I don't understand 'cryptic' commands. I'm just a humble bot 😄
fallback_responses.fallback_response_2: My developers promised to teach me everything, but for now, I'm still learning 📚
fallback_responses.fallback_response_3: I don't understand the command, but if you touch the screen with your finger, I'll make a joke 👉👈
fallback_responses.fallback_response_4: The command got lost in the depths of cyberspace 🌌
fallback_responses.fallback_response_5: Sorry, I don't understand human jokes, but here's my favorite joke: 'What do you call a cat preparing for exams? A bookworm!' 🐱📚😄
fallback_responses.fallback_response_6: Beep-boop, can't understand the command. I'm not R2-D2, but I try to be helpful 🤖
fallback_responses.fallback_response_7: Looks like I'm trapped in a misunderstanding. To exit or to stay an eternal internet traveler? 🌀
fallback_responses.fallback_response_8: To understand your command, I need you to attach a botophysics diploma to the screen 😅
fallback_responses.fallback_response_9: Oh, I'm a bit shy, but your command is too intellectual for me 🙈
fallback_responses.fallback_response_10: Please, give me a little more time to think about your command... or a joke 😉
fallback_responses.fallback_response_11: My algorithms couldn't process this command, but laughter prolongs life, so here's a joke: 'Why do programmers always walk along the riverbank? To avoid bugs!' 😂
fallback_responses.fallback_response_12: If I were a cat, I would've sent many 'Meows,' but alas, I'm just a bot 😺
fallback_responses.fallback_response_13: Seems like my artificial intelligence got a bit overheated from your creative command 🔥
fallback_responses.fallback_response_14: My electronic soul is a little sad that it couldn't understand your request. Could you please try again? 🥺
fallback_responses.fallback_response_16: Something went wrong, try another command 🤔
fallback_responses.fallback_response_17: Sorry, I don't know that command 🙇‍♂️
fallback_responses.fallback_response_19: Looks like there was an error. Please try again 🚀
fallback_responses.fallback_response_20: I'm not familiar with that command 🤨
fallback_responses.fallback_response_21: Alas, I didn't recognize your request 😕
fallback_responses.fallback_response_22: Can you repeat the command? I'm still learning 📚
fallback_responses.fallback_response_23: I'm still a little bot and don't understand all the words 😅
fallback_responses.fallback_response_24: Sorry, I'm not programmed for this request 🙁
fallback_responses.fallback_response_26: My developer didn't anticipate that possibility 🛠️
fallback_responses.fallback_response_27: Command not recognized. Please try again 🔄
fallback_responses.fallback_response_28: Oh, something went wrong. Please try again later 😶
fallback_responses.fallback_response_29: Sorry, but I still don't understand this command 🐣
fallback_responses.fallback_response_30: I'm unfamiliar with that command. Try another one 🧐
fallback_responses.fallback_response_31: My electrons are laughing, but they don't understand your command 😄
fallback_responses.fallback_response_32: Joke: 'What do you call the smartest nut? Almond!' 🌰😂
fallback_responses.fallback_response_33: Sorry, my circuits are getting confused by this request 🤖
fallback_responses.fallback_response_34: It's interesting what you mean? Maybe I don't understand human humor 🤷‍♂️

create_profile: Great! Let's start creating your profile. What is your name?
community_rules:
So, we don't have many rules in this bot):
1. Do not share explicit content here, I warned you)
2. Be polite and respectful to others)
3. Violation of the rules is strictly punished, and moreover, you will be blocked.
what_can_i_do: I don't have many functions yet 😔, but I can, for example, find a match for you), maybe even two or three), or ban you for bad behavior! But I hope this won't happen :)
wallet: Your current balance: {user_wallet} units. Would you like to top up your balance?
edit_profile: Which data would you like to change?
change_photo: Okay! Please, send a new photo for your profile:
change_preferred_age: Enter a new age range for searching:
change_search_city: Enter a new city for searching:
change_search_country: In which country are we searching?
delete_profile: Your profile has been successfully deleted.
bonuses:
⭐️ Star
💬 Say 'Hello'
👑 VIP Person
👤 Incognito
💪🏼 NO LIMITS! ... Almost
star_bonus: It gives you incredible luck, your profile appears more often and is always in the spotlight. Costs 600 points for 7 days, 1100 points per month.
say_hello_bonus: Allows you not only to like but also to send a message to a user you like. Costs 800 points for 7 days, 1500 points per month.
vip_person_bonus: Opens all the doors for you, all attention and a personal choice of profiles, without restrictions. You are a VIP person.
incognito_bonus: You are mysterious and enigmatic and can reveal your identity only to those you consider worthy.
no_limits_bonus: The existing limit seems too small for you? A unique offer to increase the number of profiles.
text_message: I am a bot for finding new people based on interests! I'll help you find a partner specially matched for you😉
sympathy: You are in the sympathy hall)
STOP: Don't hurry, create a profile first))
show_sent: Please specify the age range for searching for a partner (from what age to search?).
show_mutual_sympathy_profiles: Your profile has been successfully deleted.
show_received_sympathy: Your profile has been successfully deleted.
language_set_to_english: Your language is set to Russian.
start_profile_creation: Welcome! Let's start creating your profile. Please enter your name:
photo_update_success: Your photo has been successfully updated!
photo_update_error: An error occurred while updating the photo.
VALUE_NAME: The name should contain 3 to 15 letters. Please try again.
VALUE_AGE: Please enter a valid age (whole number).
TRABLE_AGE: Age should be between 10 and 70. Please try again.
TRABLE_GENDER: Please choose one of the provided options
VALUE_GENDER: Please choose one of the provided options: {}
TRABLE_CITY: An error occurred while getting your geolocation. Please try again or enter the name of your country or city.
TRABLE_COUNTRY_NAME: The name can only contain letters. Please try again.
ERROR: Invalid data format. Please try again.
R: Your profile has been successfully created!
YOUR_PHOTO: Send me a profile photo for identity verification.
MIN: From what age to search? (whole number).
MAX: Up to what age are we looking?
MIN_MAX: The maximum age should be greater than the minimum.
NO_PHOTO: User profile not found in the database
GREAT_PHOTO: Congratulations! Your photos match, identity confirmed.
NO_GREAT: Sorry, your photos don't match. Please send a photo with your face for identity verification.
LOOK: Great, see what I found for you
NOT_CONFIRMED: User profile is not yet confirmed. Send a photo for confirmation.
CONFIRMED: Profile confirmation status has changed. Current status:
NO_SYMPATHY: All profiles without mutual sympathy have been deleted.
SYMPATHY_DEL: All mutual sympathies have been deleted.
SEARCH: You have viewed all profiles to which you sent sympathy.
NO_SEARCH: You haven't sent sympathy to any users yet.
MY_SYMPATHY: You don't have any sympathies yet, except mine 😏
LIKE_ME:
❤️ You have a mutual sympathy! ❤️
Contact the user:
LIKE_ALL: You received a sympathy from the user! ❤️
